language.title: Vyberite yazyk
language.subtitle: Nastroyte yazyk dlya vkhoda v Karlsruhe.

origin.title: Vyberite proiskhozhdenie
origin.subtitle: Eto opredelit startovyy profil v Karlsruhe.
origin.scholarDesc: Vy znaete arkhivy, uchrezhdeniya i sotsialnye krugi goroda.
origin.journalistDesc: Vy autsayder s ostrymi voprosami i bystrym dostupom k slukham.
origin.doctorDesc: Vy peremeshchayetes mezhdu rayonami i sloyami obshchestva pod meditsinskoy roleyu.
